abstract.t: This document provides an evaluation of the applicability of three proposed approaches for a ForCES protocol: FACT[2], GRMP[3], and Netlink2[4]. A summary of each of the proposed protocols against the ForCES requirements[5] and the ForCES framework[6] is provided. Compliancy of each of the protocols against each requirement is detailed. A conclusion summarizes how each of the protocols fares in the evaluation.
